snippet.title: The Forgotten Tapes: Twisted Forms (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
The Forgotten Tapes is back! This time with a new collection of horror games set to make your body shake. Once again, The Forgotten Tapes is based on a central theme, with new and existing developers all with their own stories to tell. The game will once again allow you to play from a series of VHS tapes that have been found during your night shift at the morgue. But what has brought these 7 lost souls to your door? Not only will you get to experience 7 new stories, but you will also need to experiment, conduct autopsies, and manage your surroundings whilst trying to figure out what is going on.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2356790/The_Forgotten_Tapes_Twisted_Forms/?beta=0
